10-27-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow cast range increased from 13m to 14m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow rage per weapon damage increased from 0.015 to 0.017
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow drain rate reduced from 0.3 to 0.25
10-24-2024: - Shiv's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow now stops tracking targets that teleport
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shiv|Size=20} Shiv Dagger: reduced size of stuck dagger in victim
- Shiv {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice: reduced vfx noise for players close to it
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives collision radius reduced by 20%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting T2 cd increased from -4.75s to -25s (final cd changed from 16.25s to 25s)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting Incoming Damage Deferred reduced from 30% to 22%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting T1 changed to +8% Incoming Damage Deferred (was +5s duration)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow range reduced from 20m to 13m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage buildup per heavy melee reduced from 3.5 to 2.75
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage buffer duration reduced from 10s to 9s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage buildup vs creeps reduced by 50%
10-15-2024: - Rage decay rate increased from 0.25 to 0.3
- Rage buffer duration reduced from 12s to 10s
10-10-2024: - Fixed Shiv's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow sometimes sending him into orbit
- Fixed Shiv's Killing Blow continuing to do damage while being teleported by {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice Spirit damage scaling increased from 1.2 to 1.3
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice T1 improved from -3.75s to -4s
- Rage decay rate reduced from 0.35 to 0.25
- Rage buffer duration increased from 7s to 12s (how long it stays before starting to decay)
09-29-2024: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith Cards, Shiv Rage and lifesteal from increasing by shooting the shop
09-26-2024: - Turned off a {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shiv|Size=20} Shiv line where he referenced slowing down enemies when he wasn't actually doing so
- Bots can now choose to play Lady Geist, Mirage, Shiv, and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice T2 reduced from +85 to +75
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage buildup per spirit damage reduced from 0.02 to 0.013
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage drain rate increased from 0.3 to 0.35
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Full Rage Bonus Damage reduced from 20% to 15%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow T2 increased from 5% to 10%
09-12-2024: - Fixed issues with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives hitting targets behind walls
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice damage reduced from 125 to 105
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting Deferred Damage Cleared reduced from 50% to 40%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Bonus Damage from Full Rage reduced from +25% to +20%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow T2 now also increases Rage Amp by +5%
08-29-2024: - Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 0.5 to 0.4
- Health growth per boon reduced from +41 to +35
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice T2 reduced from +100 to +85
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice T3 now considers creeps for only half value
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting deferred damage reduced from 35% to 30%
- The targeting UI for Shiv's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow is now more clear about when the target will be killed
08-22-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting incoming damage deferred reduced from 40% to 35%
08-16-2024: - Gun base damage reduced from 6.3 to 5.7
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives collision size reduced by 10%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives projectile speed reduced by 10%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives base damage reduced from 75 to 35
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives spirit scaling reduced from 1 to 0.6
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives DPS spirit scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.16
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives T3 reduced from +75 Damage and +5 Bleed to +40 Damage and +5 Bleed
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives bouncing to other units even if it did not impact the target
- Fixed Rage and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting not clearing out on death
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting deferred damage waking him up from sleep
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow falling through the world sometimes
